channel.description: Recent content in Halloween on Second State News and Articles

item.title: Celebrate Halloween with Blockchain Smart Contract
item.description: Halloween is finally here! Are you ready for the spookiest night of the year? BUIDL IDE tools now has an upgraded UI just for Halloween. Trick or treat! A spooky pumpkin on the top welcomes you to the BUIDL’s Halloween. Now, for developers, can you tell what the following code is for? 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 pragma lity ^1.2.4; contract Halloween { function greet() pure public returns (string) { return "Happy Halloween"; } } This is a very simple (yet spooky) smart contract example, just like the “Hello World” on the internet.
